name: emkIRC
short_description: Web-based IRC client written in JavaScript and a tiny Java layer. It uses a small (few KB) Java applet to establish a socket connection. The rest of the client logic is implemented in JavaScript. The GUI is HTML and CSS, making it easily adaptable.

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat
